about_the_game:
Scare Train VR is a Virtual Reality Ghost Train Ride.

A Creepy journey through an abandoned mine, that is far from empty.

Scare Train is not a Rollercoaster, it is a suspenseful ride that HATES motion sickness and LOVES to make you JUMP.

Six minutes is a long time, in the dark, with Them...

Do YOU have the Guts to Ride the Scare Train?

  • If you are Faint-Hearted you should not ride...

  • If you don't like Spiders you should not ride...

  • If you like being SCARED then you should ride NOW...

    Although Scare Train VR does not feature nudity, blood or extreme content it is intense & frightening and is not recommended for children or anyone of a nervous disposition.

    ENTER AT YOUR OWN RISK!

content_descriptors.notes:
Although Scare Train VR does not feature nudity, blood or extreme content, its Horror setting is creepy and intense, with Monsters and Giant spiders that will make you jump.

It is not recommended for children under 12 or anyone with a heart condition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300HQ equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700HQ equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 equivalent

short_description: Scare Train VR is a Ghost Train in fully immersive Virtual Reality. A six-minute ride through a Creepy abandoned mine, that is far from empty. Please take a seat and Prepare for Suspense and Jump Scares. Are you brave enough to ride the Scare Train?
